events.message: I am filing a claim for a car accident that occurred yesterday involving a rear-end collision at a traffic light.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as it involves damage to the insured vehicle from a collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will contact the customer shortly to discuss the next steps.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and are committed to assisting you through the process as smoothly as possible.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and a copy of your driving license so we can proceed with the investigation.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and identification for verification.
An investigation into the auto accident claim has started to assess the extent of damage and liability based on the submitted evidence.
The investigation is complete and the damage to the vehicle and circumstances of the collision have been documented in detail.
A settlement offer has been proposed covering the repair costs based on the assessment of damages and policy coverage.
The customer has reviewed the settlement proposal and provided feedback with some requests for clarification on coverage details.
Following clarification and review, the auto accident claim has been approved for the full amount required for vehicle repairs.
The payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to the customer’s designated account to cover repair expenses.
The auto accident claim file has been closed successfully after confirmation that repairs were completed to the customer’s satisfaction.
The claim information and supporting documents have been archived for record-keeping and future reference if needed.
